EmailTemplate.name: 202005_EMEAI_Defense_MSP_Helicopters.internal a
EmailTemplate.subject: Stay Mission Ready. Reduce Downtime By Upto 35%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}
Every minute counts when your helicopters need to be ready for the next mission, and unexpected downtime is an unwelcome cost in this current market. What if you could reduce unplanned maintenance, lower costs and avoid unnecessary stress?
Designed for helicopter operators, the Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) - Avionics <[[http://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/maintenance-service-plan-avionics-helicopters?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_emeai_defense_msp]]> is a maintenance service program that offers full coverage for all Honeywell avionics. Because the unexpected does happen.
Three reasons why MSP for avionics matters today, more than ever:
-
Decrease time on ground by upto 35% and maximize the number of helicopters ready for flight
-
Stay mission ready with minimal operational disruption
-
Reduce costs by upto 33% by eliminating unexpected repair and exchange
You can even choose the coverage that best meets your needs - tailored to your platform and operations.
Learn how you can keep your aircraft flying longer and eliminate unexpected maintenance costs from your operations. FIND OUT HOW <[[http://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/maintenance-service-plan-avionics-helicopters?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_emeai_defense_msp]]>
